headline: EDWARDS ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 10 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump        Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.  Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Edwards RV12
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model RV 12
Pumping Speed 8.4 CFM (237.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.50E-3(En) torr (2.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes

208V, 50 Hz, 3 phase
230V, 60 Hz, 3 phase
380V, 50 Hz, 3 phase
460V, 60 Hz, 3 phase
